title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 24, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - August 24, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark discuss Michael Avenatti's recent legal victory, a legal challenge from former guest Kevin Paffrath and Israel's recent Covid surge.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
